sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { FiSave, FiRefreshCw, FiMonitor, FiPalette, FiBell, FiShield } from 'react-icons/fi'; import './SettingsTab.css'; const SettingsTab = () => { const [settings, setSettings] = useState({ theme: 'dark', animations: true, notifications: true, autoRefresh: true, refreshInterval: 5000, gridOpacity: 0.1, glowEffects: true, particleBackground: false, soundEffects: false, apiTimeout: 30000, maxRetries: 3, debugMode: false }); const [saved, setSaved] = useState(false); const handleSettingChange = (key, value) => { setSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, [key]: value })); }; const saveSettings = () => { // In a real app, this would save to localStorage or API localStorage.setItem('dcn-dashboard-settings', JSON.stringify(settings)); setSaved(true); setTimeout(() => setSaved(false), 2000); }; const resetSettings = () => { setSettings({ theme: 'dark', animations: true, notifications: true, autoRefresh: true, refreshInterval: 5000, gridOpacity: 0.1, glowEffects: true, particleBackground: false, soundEffects: false, apiTimeout: 30000, maxRetries: 3, debugMode: false }); }; return (

Dashboard Settings

Customize your network simulation dashboard experience

Reset {saved ? : } {saved ? 'Saved!' : 'Save Settings'}

Appearance

Choose your preferred color scheme
Enable smooth transitions and effects
handleSettingChange('animations', e.target.checked)} />
Add glowing borders and highlights
handleSettingChange('glowEffects', e.target.checked)} />
Adjust background grid visibility
handleSettingChange('gridOpacity', parseFloat(e.target.value))} className="cyber-slider" /> {Math.round(settings.gridOpacity * 100)}%
Animated particles in background
handleSettingChange('particleBackground', e.target.checked)} />

System

Automatically refresh network data
handleSettingChange('autoRefresh', e.target.checked)} />
How often to update data (seconds)
handleSettingChange('refreshInterval', parseInt(e.target.value) * 1000)} className="cyber-input" disabled={!settings.autoRefresh} />
Request timeout in milliseconds
handleSettingChange('apiTimeout', parseInt(e.target.value))} className="cyber-input" />
Maximum retry attempts for failed requests
handleSettingChange('maxRetries', parseInt(e.target.value))} className="cyber-input" />
Show additional debugging information
handleSettingChange('debugMode', e.target.checked)} />

Notifications

Show system notifications
handleSettingChange('notifications', e.target.checked)} />
Play sounds for actions and notifications
handleSettingChange('soundEffects', e.target.checked)} disabled={!settings.notifications} />

Security

Auto-logout after inactivity (minutes)
Remove sensitive data when closing

About DCN Dashboard

Version: 1.0.0

Build: 2024.06.12

API Status: Online

Last Updated: {new Date().toLocaleString()}

Performance

Memory Usage:
45%
CPU Usage:
23%
Network:
67%
); }; export default SettingsTab;
